text: The doors keep closing I ve tried  I ve tried and tried and tried  I feel like I ve done everything I can  I ve gone through medication  I ve tried therapy  I ve tried counselling  I ve tried talking to close friends  relatives  people I trust  But nothing works  Nothing ever helps  I can feel it  see the doors closing one by one  And I feel like there s only one option left  And I m afraid  Terrified  I don t know what to do anymore  I don t want to die  any more than anyone else  but I don t know what to do  I m running out of options  Justifications  Reasons  Every night I dream of death  and every day I just wish I could die  But I don t want do  I m growing weak  Oh god  I m growing so weak  I hide behind smile after smile  I hide behind a person that others want to be around  but I can t take it anymore  I can only see one door anymore  Please  Somebody  Anybody  I m out of options  and I don t know what to do
summary: Every night I dream of death and every day I just wish I could die. Nothing helps. I'm afraid and I don't know what to do anymore. I hide behind smile after smile. I can't take it anymore.
cleaned: night dream death day wish die help afraid not know anymore hide smile smile not anymore
